name: NSURLConnection
desc: An object that enables you to start and stop URL requests.

items.name: class func canHandle(URLRequest) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether a request can be handled based on a preflight evaluation.

items.name: var originalRequest: URLRequest
items.desc: A deep copy of the original connection request.

items.name: func start()
items.desc: Causes the connection to begin loading data, if it has not already.

items.name: func cancel()
items.desc: Cancels an asynchronous load of a request.

items.name: func schedule(in: RunLoop, forMode: RunLoop.Mode)
items.desc: Determines the run loop and mode that the connection uses to call methods on its delegate.

items.name: func setDelegateQueue(OperationQueue?)
items.desc: Determines the operation queue that is used to call methods on the connectionâ€™s delegate.

items.name: func unschedule(from: RunLoop, forMode: RunLoop.Mode)
items.desc: Causes the connection to stop calling delegate methods in the specified run loop and mode.
